title: Daily Note - 2025-06-28
summary: Productive day focused on improving Collapsi RL training with session timestamps, architecture preservation, MCTS integration, and fixing diagnostic issues. Also completed comprehensive academic paper analysis and enrichment, transforming basic summaries into detailed technical documents, and set up an initial repository for an interactive CV project.
accomplishments: Implemented session timestamps for Collapsi RL training checkpoints
Added complete architecture preservation in Collapsi RL checkpoints
Created comprehensive model evaluation system with tournaments and heatmap visualizations for Collapsi
Integrated Monte Carlo Tree Search (MCTS) with PPO training for Collapsi enhanced gameplay
Fixed all type checking and diagnostic issues across the Collapsi codebase
Rewrote Collapsi README.md and updated CLAUDE.md documentation
Completed comprehensive analysis and enrichment of all academic papers
Transformed basic academic paper summaries into 300+ line technical documents
Added deep mathematical frameworks and theoretical implications to academic analyses
Connected academic research to broader literature in optimal transport, control theory, and statistical mechanics
Created publication-quality academic analyses suitable for graduate reference
Set up initial repository for Interactive CV project with academic profiles and paper analyses
Created comprehensive academic profile with research style and technical mastery sections for Interactive CV
Made initial git commit preserving all academic work for Interactive CV
insights: Session timestamps are crucial for preventing checkpoint confusion in long training runs
MCTS integration can add 200-400 Elo strength but at 50x computational cost
Monte Carlo returns work better than GAE for short-horizon games like Collapsi
Systematic paper analysis methodology produces significantly better academic documentation
Terminal outcome prediction as auxiliary loss improves credit assignment in RL
learning: MCTS implementation patterns for two-player games
future_work: Start comparative training runs: Standard PPO vs PPO+MCTS
Set up GitHub repository for interactive CV project
Begin frontend development for interactive CV presentation
